cs1332.before:
DO NOT OPEN THE EXAM YET.

SCAN YOUR BUZZCARD, OR ELSE YOU MAY RECEIVE A ZERO.

RAISE YOUR HAND TO BE ESCORTED TO THE RESTROOM.
cs1332.during: RAISE YOUR HAND TO BE ESCORTED TO THE RESTROOM.
cs1332.after:
STAY SEATED UNTIL YOUR EXAM IS COLLECTED.

DO NOT DISCUSS THE EXAM TODAY.
IT IS AN HONOR CODE VIOLATION.
